title: I don't know if this has been suggested, but Lifeguard Sivir
body:
http://i.imgur.com/SsZTkx9.jpg

Her auto attack is lifesavers she throws at people 

Her Q, she shouts "No Running!" 

Her E is the red cross insignia

Her R is lifeguard whistle

replies.body: Still waiting on Pizza Delivery Sivir :(
But like...Who would throw the pizza they're delivering :c
How the hell else are you going to deliver it on time?
If only someone told Tobey Maguire this in Spider Man 2...
Walter White.

With Assistant Manager Azir
#TheOrderIsGiven{{champion:268}}
Why is there not a Pizza Party theme set for Shurima, like there is a Pool Party theme for Demacia and Zaun.
Pool Party isn't restrained to Demacia and Zaun. There are champs from everywhere.
Baker pantheon pls
**MY PROFESSION!**{{champion:80}}

Or Pizza Baker Pantheon
Or Chef Fiora
Or Waiter Jayce
that would take intentional feeding to a whole new level tho

just saying... https://mapskins.com/2016/03/24/pizza-delivery-sivir/

Edit: https://mapskins.com/2016/05/01/pool-party-sivir/

And make a Braum one to go with it, so A) it matches bot lane and B) because his shield is a raft thing. OMG they would be awesome together.
https://40.media.tumblr.com/fab031441fd8f31751e1d6f82218f035/tumblr_nocyayDm0r1sfvhm7o1_1280.png

http://pm1.narvii.com/5764/8e55fe8212a7d2437db769dd1c657d93f56db3ef_hq.jpg

Here's his ultimate.

rito pls

They need to at least make him wear my swim _shorts_,  though. Lawd! 

He should also have a nip flex animation. Amrite?
NO wtf, its perfect as it is.
Well imo, dat bootay is too much, lol.

It has been suggested before, at least as far back as 2014

http://i.imgur.com/2UikoeO.jpg

I think a Riot artist also drew a concept for Pizza Delivery Sivir in the same year as her VU.
Those muscles tho...
Dem muscles, i need pls.

I already have two Sivir skins, but...
http://i.imgur.com/HcqORAn.gif?noredirect

As a Sivir main, I'm freaking upvoting this !

Also I love the "SHURIMA" on the life saver ! Really cool and fun concept

It has been suggested before, but it REALLY needs to happen

"No running"

Sivir ult...
Well, summer is coming...

Well, I'm ..........

Nevermind, not appropriate for the boards.
Wet?
Yes. I'm damp.
You're so moist.

I would totally buy Lifeguard (probably Pool Party) Sivir. It has been suggested before, but it is always great to see more. Also, is this your drawing? Because it is quite an amazing idea of PP Sivir.
Could Just be a Legendary Pool Party Skin
what about pizza delivery Sivir ?

Sorry... Lifeguard thresh... Hehe... Ya know? The lantern??? Wouldn't it be amazing? 
Yes.{{champion:412}}

Yeeesss. He has no unique skin so far - this'd be the answer with: 

Q - Netpole 
W - Lifesaver/Buoy W of course (the rubber ducks souls idea from Shahamut was ingenious)
R - Coast guard tape

Something like that. He needs and deserves a new skin!

The souls could be rubber ducks!

The lantern a life saver ring!
wifeguard thresh FIFY

This.. This is pretty brilliant. I have all the Sivir skins available. I want Pax Sivir and Victorious Sivir. :( 

Does anyone know where I can buy the skin/a code for the skin that's not in the LoL store itself..? I've heard of people doing it but I don't know how.
*Pool Party Sivir
We've gotten enough sivir skins this past 12 months no thank you
oh my god, this is perfect, damn!
no way. I like her weapon to actually look dangerous.
I'm still waiting on life guard braum <3
That would be better as a Pool Party Sivir  imo xD
Please please please I see no reason why this shouldn't be a skin
I would still rather have pool party Urgot
pool party with full of lifesaver?
awww yeeeeaaahhh
